title: Spectacular Views! Visit Avion Today!
posting_body: ['Avion at Sunrise Mountain', '6901 E. Lake Mead Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89156', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 129', 'OR Text', '129', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Welcome home to Avion at Sunrise Mountain', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 726 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Avion at Sunrise Mountain Apartments located on beautiful Sunrise Mountain in Northeast Las Vegas, Nevada.', 'Avion sits high atop the city of lights and offers spectacular views of both downtown and the fabulous Las Vegas Strip.', 'Avion offers the convenience of urban living and the quiet atmosphere found usually in suburban neighborhoods.', 'Residents of Avion at Sunrise Mountain Apartments enjoy first class amenities including two sparkling pools and luxurious outdoor spa tubs, 24-hour access fitness center, business center and tot-lot.', 'The individual homes are equipped with modern electric appliances, roman soaking tubs and architectural features that truly set Avion apart from other communities.', 'Avion at Sunrise Mountain Apartments soars above the competition and is a place that you can be proud to call home.', 'Features', '- Full size washer/dryer connections', '- Refrigerator', '- View', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Pantries', '- Built-In Microwaves', 'Community Amenities', '- Tot Lot', '- Clubhouse', '- 24 Hour Fitness Room (ask for details)', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- Online Payments Accepted', '- Two Sparkling Swimming Pools', '- Business center', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- Professional Management', '- Spa', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Saturday Sunday 10:00am - 5:00pm', 'Pet Policy', 'Cat and Dogs under 40 lb', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'g5HV41Cd7O']
